choices: Body Expansion (By any medium you see fit.)
1.content:
Instead of choosing a girl, you'll chose a type of expansion here. You'll chose the girl(s) in the next chapter for most choices.

Also, I added choices for Penny wherever I could. For those who don't know, Penny is one of the new characters introduced in Wario Ware: Smooth Moves. She's Dr. Crygor's granddaughter and is a scientist like him, only she's a cute girl too. Her intro video can be found here:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xB3cU5pD3...
1.title: Genre!

11.content: Now, who's going to become a balloon?
11.title: Swell!

111.content:
Mona sighs as she rides down the road, exhausted from her usual long day of work and school. However, she is unusually exhausted today, so she is forced to stop and rest so that she doesn't end up falling asleep while riding her moped. "Phew...now let's see..." she says, looking over a map of the local area. "That's funny...this rest stop isn't listed on the map..." she says, as she rolls up the map and looks around. She eventually comes across a listing of the accomodations at the rest stop.

Two in particular grab her attention: A hot spring, and a convience store/gas station.
111.title: What kind of Rest Stop is this?

choices: She's still expanding in the spring.
1111.content:
"Don't know why a rest stop would have a hot spring, but I only need to rest for a couple hours and I'm not really hungry enough to get something at that store." Mona says, as she walks over to the hot spring. When she gets there, she notices that there is nobody tending the hot spring.

"This is just getting weirder and weirder..." she says, as she shrugs and exchanges her clothes for a towel before walking into the spring and sitting down. "Ahhh...so relaxing...an hour or so in here and I'll be rested enough to make it back home." she says, sighing contentedly as she nods off. As she nods off, she doesn't notice that the water temperature seems to be increasing gradually. Dispite reaching temperatures that would certainly be dangerous for a human, Mona is oddly unaffected, as if she was shielded from an increase in body temperature. However, the air inside her is affected, which causes it to expand, which naturally causes Mona to expand. She doesn't even notice that her body is starting to fill up the hot spring as she sleeps soundly.

When she awakens...
1111.title: Hot Air Spring

choices: Go back in and get even bigger.
Enjoy what being a balloon-girl has to offer.
11112.content:
Mona yawns and opens her eyes. She feels tightness around her middle and looks down, only to be surpized to see a large, tan, ten foot wide sphere where she was expecting to see her body. "Whoa!" She shouts, before trying to pull herself out of the spring. After some struggling, she manages to do. She then rolls herself on to her feet, which are somehow still functional enough to allow her to waddle.

"Wow, the spring made me fill up like a balloon." she says as she pokes herself. "Hrum...if I stayed in there any longer, I would have probably ended up getting stuck. And that would mean I'd be forced to get huge...hum." She looks over the spring, realizing that her body has contracted enough to allow her to fit snuggly in the spring. "Hrum...I could play around with this...though it might be more fun if I'm much bigger than I am now."
11112.title: Give the spring another chance.

choices: The set of trees with the round fruits.
The set of trees with odd shaped fruits.
112.content:
"Since when was foraging for food something a ninja has to learn?" Ana asks, as she scans the bushes and trees for anything that is edible.

Kat sighs. "Try to understand, Ana. There's times where we'll have to spend quite a few days away from home, and during that time we could run out of food. By practicing with our foraging, we..." Kat begins. Ana rolls her eyes as Kat trails off.

"You're just lucky I'm better at identifying what's good to eat and what's not. I remember the last time you decided to forage on your own." Ana says, giggling a little.

Kat nods, sheepishly. "Yeah, but at least we learned that directly eating the seltzer tablets does not help." she says.

The two girls laugh a bit, as the come across a large field of trees with quite a few varaities of fruit.

"Oooh, wow...it's like a natural buffet...ok, besides anything obvious, what all here would be edible, Ana?" Kat asks.

Ana quickly inspects each tree, finding finding about 4 different varaties of fruit. However, she can't recognize any of them. She eventually goes back to where Kat is waiting. "I...I've never seen any of these in my life."

"Well, there's only one thing to do, then..." Kat says, as the two of them look over at the several varaties of fruit, considering what type seems more appealing to them.
112.title: Unusual fruits will make unusual ninjas do unusual

1121.content: "Well, the fruits on those trees look normal enough, so let's go with them." Ana says, as she points at a pair of trees: One with round, shiny fruits, and one with fruit that are causing the branches of the tree they are in to sag a little.
1121.title: Round fruits are best?

choices: Stop a crime of some sort.
11211.content:
"Well, those nice and shiny fruits looks like they could be tasty." Kat says, as she grabs a couple of the fruits from the tree. She tosses one to Ana, and they both eat it. "Ahhh...this one's a little sour, and pretty juicy, too...a bit tough, though." Kat says, as she continues to eat the fruit.

Ana nods. "Yeah, what you said...I've never had a fruit quite like that." she says, finished with the fruit. "Now, to see what exactly this fruit does..." Ana says, as they wait for something to happen.

And something certainly does happen. A few minutes after the girls ate the fruit, they begin expanding from the middle out. Kat cries out while Ana just pokes herself. As their middles expand, they slowly begin to absorb the rest of their bodies, as the girls are slowly turned into giant rubber balls. After a while, even their heads sink in, leaving the pair completely sphereical.

Kat blinks a little. "...what the hell just happened!?" Kat finally shouts, breaking the awkward slience.

"Offhand, I'd say we've been turned into rubber balls." Ana says, unable to really look herself over due to the lack of a neck.

"Ack...well, I...guess this isn't so bad. On the plus side, I feel great." Kat says.

"But I don't really think we can move...unless..." Ana says, as an idea forms in her head. Kat watches as Ana compresses herself a bit at a slight angle, the watches as Ana bounces away. Ana giggles and comes to a stop, then bounces back over to Kat.

Kat blinks. "Whoa! That was awesome, Ana! Now that I know we can move, I don't think I have any problems being like this!" Kat says, giggling a little. "Now, how about we go show off?" Kat has a wide grin on her face as she says this.

Ana makes herself bob up and down, signifying nod. "Sure thing, Kat!" Ana exclaims. "Anything to get out of this foraging stuff." Ana says, the two ninja girls bounce off somewhere.

Kat giggles as they bounce along. "Now, how exactly are we going to show off?"
11211.title: Rubber Ball Ninja Girls!

11212.content:
Kat looks over at the tree with the heavy fruits "Huh...I wonder what's up with those fruits?" Kat says, as she goes over to the tree and whacks it with the sheath of her sword. Almost half of the fruits fall off the tree due to the weakness of the branches holding them. Kat manages to get out of the way before she is crushed by the heavy fruits.

"Whoa...those things are dangerous..." Ana says, as Kat takes a bite out of one of the fruits that fell to the ground. "Erf...it's sweet...but for something the size of an apple, it sure is heavy..." Kat says.

Ana nods. "Yeah...good thing we're strong from all the sword practice we do." Ana says, as she picks up another fruit and eats it.

Because of their small size, Kat and Ana manage to finish eating the fruits rather quickly. "Phew...those things sink straight to the bottom, huh?" Kat asks. Ana nods. "Yeah...I already feel so full." Ana says as she rubs her slim belly, only to feel it suddenly bulge out. "Wow...they're really filling...my stomach is starting to get big just from eating it..."

Kat giggles. "Don't be silly, Ana. It was just an apple-sized fruit. Your belly shouldn't be getting that much fuller fr-" Kat says, stoping when she notices that Ana's belly IS bigger...and still growing. "Eek! I guess I could be wrong..." Kat looks down at her own belly to see that it's filling up as well. Kat tries to get up, but finds that what she's filling with is so heavy that it's holding her down.

Ana groans as she and Kat fill up with what seems to be a very heavy and extremely thick liquid. "Wh-what do we do, Kat!?" Ana shouts, as whatever they're being filled with causes them to to slowly round out, although not very well at first. All Kat can do is shrug as her legs start to get absorbed by the rest of her body. After about 10 minutes, the girls are filled up to the point where they're rounded by the stuff. The girls are 30 feet wide each, and are one hundred times as heavy in pounds.

The girls don't say anyting for a while, but Ana suddenly breaks the silence with a giggle. "Ooooh...I think I'm starting to enjoy myself..." Ana says.

Kat starts to object, but realizes that she's enjoying herself as well. "You're...right. I don't think I've ever felt better..." she says.

"So, what are we going to do, Kat?" Ana asks.
11212.title: Heavy ninja girls.

112122.content:
As Kat watches, Ana slowly rolls to the same tree picking up speed, and then "CRASH" all the rest of the round fruits fell on the nook right before the tree. With that, Ana feels the heavy liquid inside her start to expand her again due to the violent charge at the tree. Kat looks astonished as Ana fills up to be about 50 feet wide and stops there. Kat feels a bit left out and very carefully scoops up 10 of the round fruits and eats through them like nothing.
"Wow Kat, look at you!"
As she said that Kat grew out to become 85 feet wide all around and could feel all the liquid inside her sloshing about.
"I think my lungs are somewhat bigger, I mean if they weren't i'd probably have drowned in liquid by now."
Kat then drew on her lungs and breathed in deeply, little did she know that the liquid had a reaction to excess air. In that very instant all the liquid that rested inside Kat wanted to escape through her skin to get away from the air that was also inside her gigantic spherical body. This made her triple in size and begin to be able to move about as long as she had air inside her belly.
"Okay Ana, I want you to eat some more of those fruits and do as I do."
"Sure thing, I can't move as is.."
"Come on, I know you can do it!"
"Alright Kat, i'll try."
Ana rammed the tree again, but this time caught the falling fruits in her mouth on the way down, she had 23 by the time the side effects had kicked in.
"Here we go!" Yelled Ana
Ana's whole frame began to squeal under the bloat of the new juices inside of her, and she watched to see exactly what Kat was doing to stand up, but didn't understand and continued to expand.
By the time she stopped she wasn't much bigger than Kat size wise without sucking in air, but she was MUCH heavier.
"I didn't get it, so I just went with what the fruit was going to do to me."
"That's okay, now this is what I want you to do, suck in as much air as you can, not exactly into your lungs as I thought of, but just swallow air down into your belly."
Ana thought about it, and then with one enormous gulp she sucked in so much air that she was now touching Kat with her bloated form at a distance.
"Holy crap Ana, that was amazing."
Ana has a plan..
112122.title: The sisters get heavier.

1121221.content:
Ana giggles as Kat stares at Ana's 810 foot wide body. "Hehe...it sure is amazing, and it would be even better if you joined me..." Ana suggests.

"Oh...sure!" Kat says enthusiasticly, as she goes over to the closest tree and starts shaking it until 13 fruits have fallen into her mouth. Kat grins as her body swells outward from the fruit, stoping once she's reached 600 feet wide. From that point, she puffs herself up with air until she matches Ana's size. "Awesome! Now we're both huge!" Kat exclaims.

Ana nods. "We sure are...but wouldn't it be even better to be massive? Think about how big we'd be after eating every one of those heavy fruits. We already ate a tree full, and look at us! This forest has hundreds of trees with the exact same fruit. We'd be at least one hundred thousand feet wide! Although I'm probably just exaggerating..." Ana explains with a wide grin on her face.

Kat just scraches her head. "I don't know if I want to be that massive, but it would be nice to rival the size of say...a city."

Ana frowns. "Aww...come on, Kat. Being gigantic will be fun..." she pleads.
1121221.title: Hardly big enough.

choices: The size of a small country. (~1000 miles wide.)
The size of the moon! (...dunno. Really big, though.)
11212211.content:
Kat shrug. "Eh. If you insist, Ana. I guess being a few thousand miles wide will be more fun, anyway." Kat says.

Ana giggles and claps her hands together. "Ooh, good! We're going to be so big and heavy!" Ana says, giggling even more as she starts to gather the fruits that made them heavy.

The girls manage to collect around 1000 fruits, and smile as they start to eat them up one by one, giggling as each one adds to their already huge bulk. By the time the two ninjas are done with the fruits, each of them are at least 250 miles wide. Ana grumbles to herself. "This is it? I wanted to get bigger..." Ana pouts. Kat just smiles.

"Heh...we can still puff ourselves up. Besides, we need to do that to regain mobility, anyway."

Ana blinks, and nods quickly. "Ah! Right. Hehe, we can still get very big after all!"

And so, the girls puff themselves up until they're...
11212211.title: Ultra-sized girls.

112122112.content:
"Ana?" Kat asks, after they've finished puffing up.

"What is it, Kat?" she replies.

"Are you SURE you were exagerating?" Kat says, realizing that they now rival the moon in size.

Ana nods, though Kat can't really tell since Ana's head is a few thousand miles away. "Yeah, pretty sure! If I had to guess, I'd say we're at least 2500 miles wide!" she shouts.

Kat shrugs. "I still say we're excessively big, though!"

"Heh, I don't think we're big enough!" Ana says with a giggle.

Kat rolls her eyes. "How do you suggest we do that?"

"Maybe -I- can help with that..." says a voice from behind Kat that sounds very familiar. Kat manages to turn her head to see Ashley 'towering' over her, though pretty much anything would seem like that with her head attached to the ground. "Oh, it's you. I thought we'd have flattened you when we became 250 miles wide." Kat says, not particularly fearing what Ashley might do.

Ashley shrugs casually. "Probably would have been if Red hadn't pointed out a couple of really large objects growing in the middle of my orchard." she explains.

Ana is able to hear their conversation. "Well, that explains alot!" she shouts. Kat nods. "It does."

Ashley nods. "Anyway, since you have so kindly offered to help me test my fruits out on you, I figured I might as well grant your wish along the way."

Both girls giggle and respond at the same time. "Really!?" they shout gleefully.

Ashley nods as she murmurs a spell. Suddenly, she starts to grow into a giantess, eventually becoming as high as the twins are wide. She grins as she looks them over. "Now, what am I going to do with you two..."
112122112.title: Raided the Wrong Garden?

choices: Kat gets up to find Ashley's head flattened.
Ashley makes herself as tall as she is wide.
1121221121.content:
"You know, I think I picked the wrong size for what I want to do. Hehe, see you two in a bit." Ashley says, as she shrinks herself down to normal.

The girls scratch their heads, since the expansion doesn't seem to be affecting their limbs anymore. "I wonder what that was all about..." Kat says as they look down at the ground, only to see a whole lot of brown as well as foot prints where Ashley once was. Soon, however, they see something red begin to bulge out. It doesn't take them long to realize the red thing is Ashley. Soon, Ashley reaches the same size as the girls are, only she looks slightly like she's packed full of the fluid the girls are only partially filled with.

The girls giggle a bit as they waddle over to Ashley, who is genuinely shocked. "Why are you moving?!" she asks, being unable to move herself.

The girls giggle as they look Ashley over. "Hehe. We filled ourselves with air in addition to the stuff from the fruits. It seems like you're purely filled with that stuff." Kat explains.

Ashley smirks. "Oh? Hehe, I don't think you girls should have told me that..." she says. The girls are forced to back off as Ashley quickly fills herself with air, which causes her to tower over both of the girls.

But soon, both girls find themselves droping towards a giant red surface that is actually Ashley's massive body. It seems Ashley is big enough to now be the center of gravity, which has caught the girls but not the planet. Ashley grins as the planet disappears over her horizon while the Kat and Ana plop down in front of her.

"Hehe, how's that? Impressed?" Ashley says, grinning.

Ana shrugs. "Doesn't really solve the original problem of you not being able to move."

"Yeah. Since you're so big, you've become the center of gravity around here, which means you won't be able to move unless you find something bigger to stand on." Kat explains.

Ashley blinks. "So, I still planned on this." she says.

"Hehe, plan this, then!" Kat says as she waddles over to Ashley's head and promptly sits down in that spot. "Hehe, can't do much when I'm sitting on your head, can you?" she asks, which prompts a giggle from Ana. Then...
1121221121.title: Planet-Person Ashley.

choices: She finds herself and the girls back to normal.
11212211211.content:
Kat grins as she waddles off of Ashley's head, which is revealed to be horisontally flattened. "Ooh! Hehe, I pressed her head flat!" she says.

"Are you sure?" Ana asks, looking over at where Kat was sitting. She finds what seems to be a rather large patch of black, which represents the top of Ashley's head. "Oooh! You did!" she says, giggling a little.

Kat nods. "With her head all flat like that, I bet she can't say anything, which means she won't be able to use her spells."

"Oooh, that means she'll be stuck like this!" Ana says. "She'll be like our own personal playground!" she exclaims with glee.

Ashley hears the whole thing, and mentally sighs. Suddenly, she remembers that she mentally control her mass. "Hehe..." she thinks, as she starts to concentrate.

Soon, the girls feel the surface of Ashley's body become more solid. Just as this happens, they feel themselves being squeezed horisontally. "Whoa! What's going on!?" Ana shouts.

Kat blinks. "I...think we're being flattened!" she says.

Of course, Kat is correct. Their bodies keep being pressed by the gravitational pull Ashley is generating until they're both completely flat against Ashley's surface, though the girls were smart enough to look upwards just before they became unable to move their necks.

"Oh...well, this was unexpected..." Kat says, blinking a little.

Ana grins. "Yeah, but I guess it's not too bad!" she says, giggling a little.

Kat giggles as well. "Yeah...kinda peaceful, really." she replies.

"Hehe...like it or not, I beleive I've gotten my revenge. I'm sure it'll be hard for you to enjoy it once you two start to get bored..." Ashley thinks as she reduces her mass so that she drifts into deep space. "In the meantime...I think I'll sleep for a very long time..."

When Ashley wakes up...
11212211211.title: The Last Laugh?

1122.content:
The girls look over at a pair of trees with fruits that aren't round. One set of fruits resemble giant seeds, while another set look like they're overly ripe. "Hrum...maybe we should start with these...just to get them out of the way." Kat says.

Ana nods. "Yeah...they don't look very tasty...but...which ones should we start with?"
1122.title: They have to eat them eventually...

11221.content:
"Bleh...let's go with those seed looking fruits...those rotten-looking ones might make us sick or something...like, maybe they look that way a s a natural defense." Ana says. Kat blinks, and nods in agreement.

And so, Kat hops into the tree and grabs two of the seedy fruits, then hops back down with them. Kat tosses one to Ana, and then they prepare to bite into what they're sure is a hard fruit...but instead, their teeth sink right in with a light crunch. "Hey, these are just like giant sunflower seeds or something, only without the shell." Ana comments, as she continues to eat the seed-like fruit, finishing just a few moments before Kat does.

"Meh, it could have used some salt." Kat says, as she dusts the remains off of her hands. "Well, I guess we have to get those mushy-oozy fruits now..."

Ana nods. "Just as soon as we see if these have some sort of effect." Ana says, hoping to at least delay the inevitable. However, a few moments after she says this, she notices that Kat is starting to look odd. Specifically, her skin starts by turning a light shade of red...
11221.title: Giant seeds make giant fruit!

choices: Blue. She becomes a...blue pumpkin of some sort? o.O
112211.content:
Ana blinks and looks at Kat as her skin stops when it's a soft pink color. Kat is oblivious to the change her body is going through, outside of a light tingle, which she doesn't find too unusual, having eaten an odd fruit.

"Ana, why are you staring at me like th-" Kat starts, being cut off by a sensation that feels similar to being filled up with fluid. "Gack! I feel really weird..." she says, looking down to see what has, and is, happening to her. Kat yelps as she sees her body filling up with what seems to be a very thick fluid. While thick, it seems to be light enough to keep Kat's body from sagging down to the ground as she grows to a size that's as wide as she is tall.

Ana goes over to Kat and pokes at her, her finger leaving a indentation in Kat's surface. "Whoa...you kinda look like a big peach, but at least you don't feel like one..."

Kat nods. "Eep...y-" Kat says, stopping because she already feels yet another sensation, this one being like everything inside of her suddenly becoming a solid mass, the once light fluid suddenly becoming a heavy solid. The change also causes a stem to grow out of the top of her head, completing Kat's transformation into a peach.

Ana is too shocked for words, watching as Kat struggles to move, wiggling her hands and feet. "Ana, help me up!" Kat shouts. Ana comes to her senses and runs over to Kat and starts to help her up, not noticing that her skin has become a shade of...
112211.title: Ana and the Giant Peach.

choices: A certain witch-girl wanders into this reigon of forest.
1122112.content:
Ana helps Kat to her feet as her skin turns to a pastel blue color. "Erf...thanks, Ana." Kat says. "And...I think the seed you ate is starting to kick in..." Kat says, noticing her blue skin.

Ana blinks. "Whuh oh...have a feeling I'm going to get very-" Ana starts, as the same thing that happened to Kat suddenly kicks in with Ana, making her grow very big fairly quickly. "-large!" Ana shouts, as her body gets 5 times as big as Kat. "Urk...yeah, I was right...very, very big..."

Kat blinks. "Wow...how did you know you'd get that big!?" Kat shouts.

Ana nods. "Well, you see-" Ana pauses when she feels her body grows solid as well. Kat resembles a giant pumpkin, only blue. "-when I saw my skin turn this this particular shade of blue, I knew exactly what I was going to turn into: a Jarrahdale, which is a plant native to Austraila..." Ana explains, as she trails off.

Kat sighs. "Ok, ok, so you're a big blue pumpkin...now, what exactly ARE we going to do about this?"

Ana giggles. "I sort of like being a large fruit, but I guess we could find a way to at least return to mobility..."
1122112.title: Jarrahdale: A light-blue pumpkin native to Austral

11221122.content:
"Well, well, well...what do we have here..." says a voice that could only belong to Ashley. Kat turns to Ashley. "Me and Ana were practicing foraging when we found these strange fruits. We ate the seed-like ones, and ended up like this." Kat explains.

Ashley smiles. "Ahh..." Ashley starts.
11221122.title: Ashley arrives.

choices: Use the rotten fruits on them.
112211221.content:
Kat rolls her eyes as the words leave Ashley's lips. "Why am I not surprised you had something to do with this?"

Ashley glares at Kat. "Hey, I'm not the one who starting eating fruit from my private meadow." yells Ashley, who then points at a sign that reads. [Private property: Keep off or else!!]

Ana tries a more sympathetic gesture. "We're sorry, Ashley, we honestly didn't know...so...do you think you could return us to normal?"

Ashley nods. "Yes I can." she starts. "Well, I guess they've been punished enough, but then again, maybe I could put them through a bit more..." she thinks, as she looks over at a tree with the mushy, rotten-looking fruits.
112211221.title: Ashley helps...

1122112212.content:
Ashley goes over to the tree with the rotten fruits and knocks against it a couple of times, which causes the same amount of fruit to drop from the tree. She then hands one to Kat while making the other one float over to Ana. "Despite their appearance, those fruits will return you to normal." Ashley says. "Besides, what other choice do you have other than having me rot you away in order to make your seeds grow?"

Kat and Ana look at the fruits, and...
1122112212.title: Tough choice...

11221122121.content:
Ashley watches the fruits splut against the ground. "Eh? You actually want me to decompose you two?" Ashley says, lifting an eyebrow.

Kat laughs. "Like we wouldn't rot anyway if we ate those!"

Ashley blinks. "...well, if you both feel that way, I can arrange that if you want...you do want to go through with that, right?"
11221122121.title: We'd probably rot anyway!

choices: Kat would rather stay a plant.
Kat ends up gassy as well.
112211221211.content:
"...sorry, Kat, but I think Ashley's telling the truth. You'll just have to decay by yourself." Ana says.

Kat grumbles. "Ok, ok. Fine. Ashley, get this over with." Kat says, ready to be turned to compost.

Ashley nods, and murmurs a spell to herself. "Don't worry, Kat, this will only last a minute..." Ashley says after finishing the incantation.

Within a few seconds, Kat feels an odd sensation as her body begins to break down rather quickly. However, unlike what you'd normally expect from decomposition, Kat looks more like she's being turned into slime rather than mold. Ana blinks, able to see her sister turn into a dull-orange ooze.

Ashley grins. "A special kind of fungus is busy breaking you down...as it consumes, it turns your body into a nice slime. Once it's done, I can return your body to normal...and you're pretty much done, so..." Ashley murmurs another spell, as Ashley turns Kat back to normal, with a slight exception...

------------

"Augh! I can't believe you turned me into a plant-girl!" Kat says, having jumped on top of Ashley, ready to pummel her. Ashley manages to toss Kat off of her, gets up, and dusts herself off.

"So I screwed up the spell. And as you are about to see, you would have been returned 100% to your old form if you just listened to me." Ashley says, as she floats another one of the the rotten fruits up to Ana.

Kat grumbles. "If that girl gets hurt, I'll cut you in two..."

Ana sniffs at the fruit. "Oooh! It smells kinda sweet!" Ana shouts, as she puts all fears behind and eats up the fruit. "It's pretty tasty, too!"

Suddenly, Ana finds herself shrinking and slimming down, until she's her old self. Kat's jaw literally drops the the ground, which Ashley then lifts back up to Kat's face, making a 'cha-ching' sound when it's back in place. "See? What did I tell you? Back to normal...heh."

Kat raises and eyebrow. "And what are you '...heh.'ing about?"

"You'll see in just a moment. She may be back to normal, but the healing fruit has a little side effect I wanted to surprise you with." Ashley explains.

Ana blinks. "Side...effects? What side effects?" Ana asks, with part of her question being answered when she starts to bloat up. "Whoa! I'm filling up again, but this time with gas..."

Kat looks over at Ashley. "What kind of gas is she filling up with?" Kat asks, slightly annoyed with Ashely's antics.

"Only my favorite kind..." Ashley says.

"Eee...you think you could tell us what th-" Ana says, as she gets cut off as she lets out a loud fart. "Oh. Nevermind!" Ana says, poking herself a bit as she continues to bloat.

"Oh, geez, you've made her all gassy now!" Kat says, sweating a bit.

Ana giggles. "Really, Kat, it's not so bad...it actually feels reall-*pffffffffft!*-y nice!" Ana says, giggling a bit.

Ashley grins. "It would fix that plant-girl problem you're having."
112211221211.title: Let's get this going again, already!

1122112212112.content:
Kat shrugs. "Being a gasbag will be better than being stuck like this." she says, as she takes the fruit from Ashley and eats it up.

After a few moments pass, Kat returns to normal and starts to bloat up at the same time. Once she starts to get round, she lets out her first fart and floats up in the air to meet up with Ana. Ashley just grins as the ninja girls bloat up and occationally fart, with the rate of them passing gas increasing as they get larger.

Kat giggles as she adjusts to being round and gassy. "Whoo! You're r-*pbbbbbt!-ight, Ana. This is awesome!" Kat says, letting out an especially loud fart a moment later.

Suddenly, the girls can hear another set of farts, and they watch as Ashley floats up to meet them as well. "Mwehehe...nothing better than be-*frrrrrrt!*-ing bloated and *pfffffft!* gassy like this, huh?" Ashley says, seeming to be most content when she's actually farting.

After letting out a long fart, Ana giggles. "So, how long are we going to be bloating like this?" she asks.
1122112212112.title: Three gassy girls.

choices: Kat's turn to go along with Ana.
Kat takes the quick way instead.
112211221212.content:
Ana blushes a little. "Well...now that I think about it...decomposition seems like it might be fun. I mean, it is part of the cycle of life. So I think I'll go with Kat on this one and decompose along with her." she explains.

"Hey, what do you know? Maybe I found something really cool!" Ana giggled, as she went over to the box. Looking into the plush interior, she found a sealed scroll. "...oh, wow! Things like these usually have some sort of ancient knowledge on them! I wonder what I'll find when I read it!"

Ana unsealed the scroll and read it. "Hrum... it looks like this thing is supposed to teach some sort of spell... 'Art of the Blimp', it says. ...'Art of the Blimp'? What a weird name for a technique! I wonder what it does. I wonder if I should go into the forest somewhere and try it out by myself... Then again, maybe if I show this to Kat, we can both learn it together and incorporate it into a team technique of some sort..."
1421.title: The Secret Scroll

14212.content:
"...erf. I wouldn't want Kat to get mad at me if it turns out to be something bad, though. I think I'd better try it out myself before I ask Kat to do it with me." Ana says, as she tucks the scroll away and hurries outside.

Ana makes her way to a secluded part of the forest. It's here where Kat and Ana usually test out their more powerful techniques. "Hum...let's see...nope. Kat's not around" Ana says to no one in particular as she opens the scroll. "All right, it says to repeat the mantra listed in order to activate the skill."

She recites the mantra listed on the scroll. The mantra sounds like it's in a different language, most likely Japanese, though. A few moments after she says the mantra, a fierce, almost tornado-like wind whirls around her. Ana can feel the wind forcing it's way into her body, causing her to expand rapidly. Almost immediately her limbs grow even with her whole body, rendering her very round as her whole body expands several feet wider with each passing second. Ana helplessly wiggles her hands and feet as her body continues to bulge outward, and soon finds herself rolled onto her front. Once on her front, Ana feels her body starting to elongate as she's stretched into the shape of a proper blimp. She can feel her whole head starting to form the front of the blimp. Before long, the wind starts to die down, leaving a very shocked Ana to realize she had just grown into a 500 foot long blimp in all of a minute.

Ana simply stays quiet for a few minutes, before she suddenly hears something in the bushes. “Kat?!” Ana asks, hoping that it actually was her sister...
14212.title: Ana becomes a blimp.

142121.content: Ana looks though the bushes and can see some bits of red. between the leaves. "Eep...Kat doesn't wear anything red..." She says as she begins to worry about who is actually in the bushes.
142121.title: If it's not Kat...

choices: It's Ashley, and she has Kat with her.
1421211.content:
"Oh my, you poor girl." Says the person as she emerges from the bush.

Ana giggles. "Oh! Mona! For a moment I though you might have been someone else who wears red clothes!" She exclaims. Hehe...I'm glad we showed her where we lived. Ana thinks.

Mona tilts her head to the side as she looks Ana over. "How'd this happen to you, anyway?" Mona asks. Ana quickly explains what had happened with the scroll. "Ah. I see..." Mona replies. Why's she so upset? That looks like fun... Mona thinks as she picks up the scroll that Ana had dropped. "You don't mind if I try it out on myself, do you?" She asks while grinning.

Ana looks at Mona in a confounded manner. "What?! Why would you want to turn yourself into a blimp?!"

"Simply because it sounds like it would be fun to be a big blimp." she explains as she opens the scroll and reads it to herself.

Ana just blinks. "Erf. I should have known." she says as she hears Mona recite the mantra herself. Mona then goes through the same thing Ana had. It takes longer for Mona to round out than Ana did due to Mona being bigger by default. However the result is the same, and Mona ends up as a blimp just like Ana.

"Mmm...I knew being turned into a blimp would be fun." Mona says as she turns toward Ana.

Ana giggles as well. "Yeah, we certainly are...now that I've calmed down I think I can appreciate this a lot more, too!"

Mona smiles. "See? Told you so!"

They suddenly hear someone emerge from the bushes and look towards whoever it is.
1421211.title: Mona becomes a blimp too!

1422.content:
"Are you sure you know where this place is, Kat?" asks Ana, a red-haired ninja girl to her pink-haired twin.

Kat nods. "It should be exactly as the scroll we find said: An island on a tall cliff with no way on except for a rope bridge. It shouldn't be that much further." she says, as they make their way into what seems to be a clearing.

"...or it could be right here." Ana says, pointing out what Kat had described. While it isn't exactly what Kat had imagined, it certainly was a sight to see. The cliff is formed by a 1000 foot wide ring that drops into what seems to be nothingness. The island itself seems to be rather large, though, stretching at least 10 miles from the middle. The 4 foot wide rope bridge is, oddly enough, in perfect condition.

"Hah. Told you we would find it." Kat says, as the two of them walk up to the rope bridge. The bridge has a sign next to it that has an image of a foot next to an arrow pointing up.

Ana scratches her head. "I don't get it...why would a rope bridge need a sign saying that it should only be crossed by foot?" she wonders. Kat just rolls her eyes.

"You know how the saying goes: 'Stupid actions cause stupid rules'. I'm sure somebody tried to cross it in a vehicle of some sort." Kat says, as she looks down at the cliff. "Hate to fall down there, though..."

And so, the girls begin crossing the bridge. As they walk along, the notice that something seems odd. "Kat, is it just me or is this bridge getting more narrow as we reach the end of it?" Ana asks, felling less of the bridge with her feet with each step.

"Now that you mention it, it does seem kind of odd seeing that the bridge...hasn't...changed..." Kat says, trailing off as if suddenly realizing something. She looks down to see that her feet were puffed up, just barely wide enough to fit on the bridge. She looks back at Ana and sees that her feet are in the same condition. Each of their feet are around two feet wide and four feet long.

The girls blink as they recall the sign and realize what it really meant. Now that they are standing still, they can feel their feet continue to swell up. Ana begins to panic as she realizes their feet will continue to swell until they're either off the bridge or have fallen off. "What are we going to do, Kat! If our feet keep growing at this rate we won't be able to stay on the bridge!"

Kat just rolls her eyes as if the answer was obvious, which in her case, it was. "We just keep going. If we stand around, our feet'll get too big to keep us balanced on the bridge." Kat says, as their feet suddenly rip out of their shoes as if on cue. Kat remains collected, though, and just moves onward. Ana shrugs and walks along with her.
1422.title: Quest for the Mystical Magical Scroll Thingy

14221.content:
On the other side of the bridge, Ana trembles while she lays against a tree. "I thought we were done for..." Ana says.

Kat scratches her head while looking over her feet, with each one being 8 feet long and 4 feet wide. "Well, we really can't go back the way we came, since our feet would definately get too big to stay balanced on the bridge. We'll have to find another way off...somehow."

Ana begins to calm down. "I don't mind." She says, as she plops onto her feet, which are two feet longer than Kat's. "At least it'll be better than the bridge."

Kat rolls her eyes as she looks through the clearing they're in. Unlike most islands, it's covered in a large forest rather than a jungle. She notices a large rectangular stone with a message written in Katakana written on it. "Hum...'The legendary scroll can restore your body'" she reads aloud. "Hey, this means we can find it and restore our feet to normal. Then we can safely cross the bridge again!"

Ana's eyes widen. "No! No bridge! We're finding another way!" she says, half in anger, and half in fear.

Kat sighs. "Fine, but let's at least find that scroll. It's kinda hard to be stealthy with our feet bigger than us." She says, lifting her left foot and letting it fall back down with a loud 'plop!' sound to demonstrate this.

Ana nods. "All right, then...so...how do we find this scroll?"

Kat looks around to see that there are a couple of paths. The island, which is a mixture of forested areas and man-made walls, seems to be set up a lot like a structure. "Maybe we should split up? There has to be a million ways to get where we're going." Kat suggests.

"And a million ways to get seperated from each other! I think we should stick together." says Ana.
14221.title: Across the bridge

142211.content:
Kat groans. "We can always just meet back here, Ana. And we'd also run the risk of both of us getting caught in a trap. By spliting up, we have a better chance of either of us getting the scroll." Kat explains.

"Well, when you put it that way, it's not such a bad idea...ok, let's split up, then." Ana says.

And so, the girls each pick a path and head on their way.
142211.title: Splitting up.

1422112.content:
Ana walks along the corridor, which seems go so far into the island that she can't see the end of it. "This must be the main path...I wonder when I'll find a door or intersection or something..." Ana wonders. After walking a quarter of a mile, she finds what seems to be a very large hole in the wall, at least 15 feet wide. However, what's unusual about it is that it doesn't look like it is supposed to be there, as bricks stick out from the sides. Something else that she finds odd is that it looks like it was made recently, at least a few days ago.

"Whoa...this must mean that somebody else is on this island." Ana says, as she goes inside. Sure enough, the hole leads to a clearing where it looks like someone has set up camp. It's appearance is crude, though, with it's only contents being a bed made from whatever could be thrown together to make a soft surface and a pillow which is little more than a sack filled with leaves. It looks like the bed and pillow haven't seen a lot of use, though. "Huh...I guess whoever was here must have moved on."

"Actually, I just outgrew the bed and the pillow." says the voice of a young girl behind her. Ana turns around expecting to see a small girl, only to find a large, puffy-looking girl instead. "Using myself as a bed is more comfortable, anyway."

The girl looks like she's at least 5 feet wide and is mostly round. Her age seems to be around ten or so. She's wearing a pink dress that stretches about halfway down her puffy body, leaving only her panties to cover her lower body. The dress also has a heart design in the middle of her. She wears a simple pair of red boots and wristbands, as well as a set of headphones on her head. Ana realizes who she is around the same time she notices that she doesn't have puffy feet like she does.

"Oooh...you're that singer girl...uhm...Nao Komori, right...wait, how did you end up here...and like that...without puffy feet!?" she says, looking at her in a confused manner.

Komori shrugs. "I have no clue...I've been stuck here for a while now, since I realized what would happen to my feet if I tried to cross the bridge before I crossed it...which you apparently did not." she says, as Ana blushes a bit. "I must have slept through whatever happened, because that's the last thing I remember doing before I woke up on this island."

Ana nods. "Uh huh...but that doesn't explain the puffyness."

"Yeah well, I found an odd fruit. You could say it really fills you up for a day or so, as you can see." Komori explains, as she pats her bloated body a bit. "It's pretty nice once you get used to it...so, anyway, how'd you end up here?"

Ana explains about how they're searching for the healing scroll and how they're also looking for a way to get off the island. "I didn't want to split up, but Kat thought it was a good idea. Though she didn't say I couldn't join up with anyone else I found along the way..." she says, grinning a bit.

Komori giggles. "Say no more. I'll come along with you, though you might have to deal with a little problem the fruit gives me..." she says, as she suddenly farts. "It's made me really gassy. Hehe. Hope you don't mind."

Ana shakes her head. "I don't mind at all." Ana says, giggling a little. And so, after Komori manages to pack up a large supply of the fruits, the two girls head on their way.

They eventually come to a split, with one path leading left, and the other going right. There's also a set of etchings on the wall. The one of the left looks hand, while the other one is just an arrow pointing up.

"Hrum...either way's probably going to involve getting bigger in some manner." Ana says, as she scratches her head.
1422112.title: Picking up another.

14221122.content:
The girls eventually reach what appears to be another dead end. However, they look up to see a large passageway that leads up.

"But how are we going to get up there." Komori asks, before letting out an involontary fart. She and Ana look around, until Komori sees what looks like an air hose. "Maybe this will do the trick?" she asks, as Ana looks it over.

Ana scratches her head. "How are we going to use it, though?" she asks.

"Hum...inflate ourselves?" Komori says, as she giggles and jams the hose up her butt. She giggles again as the gas that's filling her up forces the gas already inside of her out, resulting in a very long fart. Ana can't help but giggle as well. After a minute or so, she begins to float up into the passageway, giggling as the hose is removed as she floats off.

Ana goes over to the hose and picks it up. "Erf...I'd rather inflate myself by mouth, but Komori stuck this up her butt...I don't know if I want to now..." Ana says, tilting her head to the side.
14221122.title: Going Up

142211222.content:
"Gross as this may be, I'm not inflating myself through my butt!" Ana says, as she sticks the hose into her mouth. Her mind is instantly taken off where the hose has been when she feels her head expand instead of her body. She almost squeals as she rubs the side of her bloating head.

Heeeeee...I'm glad I did it like this! Having a big, puffy head is so...wonderful... she though, giggling as she floats into the passageway. It's too bad I have to stop...or do I?
142211222.title: Puffhead Ana

choices: An obilisk in the middle of a clearing.
The top of another tower-esque section of the woods.
1422112222.content:
Ana giggles, and holds on to the hose so she doesn't end up floating any higher. I can let go once my head gets stuck...hehehe...it's gonna be so big! she thinks, as she waits for her head to get wedged in the stone passageway.

Once it is, she giggles and lets go of the hose. She squeals a little as he head begins to fill up the passageway both ways. Her body gets smooshed between her head and the bottom of the passageway, but she just giggles a bit and rubs what little of her head as she can with it.

-----

Meanwhile, at the top of the passageway, Komori waits for Ana to arrive. She decides to look down into the passageway to check on her progress, and sees the top of her head rising and filling up the passageway. She steps back as Ana's head fills up to the top of the passageway, and starts to fill in the passageway she's in right now. She yelps, and waddles away as fast as she can.

-----

Later, Kat is taking a break from walking along the path she picked. "Phew...who knew walking with big, puffy feet could be so hard..." she says. Suddenly, she hears something that sounds like a very loud crack. She blinks, and looks toward the direction it came from, only to see Ana's very large head burst out of a tower-esque part of the woods. "Erg...she's so much trouble." Kat says, grumbling to herself as she climbs to the top of a tree and bounds over to where Ana is.

Ana giggles as she sees Kat bound over to her. The hose is no longer in her mouth, as it was destroyed along with the rest of that section of the woods.

"Ana, what do you think you're doing!?" Kat shouts, more shocked than upset.

Ana smiles at Kat. "Finding a way off the island! I mean, doesn't this work out? I get a big, puffy head and don't have to cross that awful bridge!"

"Err...well, good job on that and all...but we're still looking for the scroll...though, I think this makes it a bit easier...hehe." Kat says, an idea forming in her head.

-----

One trip back home to get supplies and drop off Komori later, Kat has managed find a way to use Ana as a hot air balloon of sorts.

Ana giggles, happy to be able to keep her puffy head. "Isn't this nice? Now we can hunt for the scroll at our leisure!" Ana says, smiling a little.

Kat nods. "I have to admit that your fooling around has turned out to be a good thing this time." she says, looking for a good spot to start searching from.
1422112222.title: Messing around has a use!

14221122221.content:
Something that strikes Kat as odd is a large clearing in the middle of the island with a large obilisk in the center. "Hey, that looks like it's worth checking out!" Kat shouts, as she decends into the clearing.

-----

Ana grumbles. "Aww...did you have to depuff my head? I liked it all big and puffy..."

"Yes, because I still need you to help out and stuff." Kat answers.

Ana giggles at this. "This is coming from the one who wanted to split up so we didn't get trapped together."

Kat sighs. "Anyway...let's just see what's up with the Obilisk." She says, as she and Ana walk toward it.

When they get there, they notice a couple of really big footprints in the middle of what seems to be a pressure-pad. The footprints are at least 30 feet long and 15 feet wide.

"I don't believe I'm saying this, but our feet are too small...but how do we make them bigger without risking our lives with the bridge..." Kat wonders.

"Mwehehehe...maybe I could help." says a voice from behind them.

Kat and Ana turn to face Ashley. "Ack! How did you find us out here!?" Kat asks.

Ashley just grins. "Come on, did you really think that Ana having a huge balloon for a head wouldn't bring my attention? Anyway, I can help, as long as you do a favor for me...let me in on whatever it is you're looking for on this crazy, mixed up island."

I don't know if we should trust her... thinks Kat, as she runs the offer through her head.
14221122221.title: Enter Ashley

142211222211.content:
Kat reluctantly nods. "Ok, ok, we'll let you in on what we're looking for." she says, as she tells Ashley about the scroll the vauge message about what power it contains.

Ashley smiles, satsified with the information she was given. "Ok then...let me get to work." she says, smiling as she murmurs a spell to herself. Just like Ashley implied, Kat's feet begin to swell to the same size as the footmarks on the pressure pad. Kat blinks a bit, then steps onto the pressure pad. The pad sinks into the base the obilisk rests on, and causes a 10 foot wide door to open up in the middle of the obilisk.

Ashley grins as she murmurs another spell that returns Kat's feet back to eight feet long and 4 feet wide. "Sorry, can't undo stuff I didn't cast." Ashley says. Kat just nods and follows Ashley and Ana into the doorway. Inside, they end up in an elevator-like room with a couple of buttons. One looks like a puffy head attached to a sphere, and the other has what looks like a planet next to a marble.

Kat blinks, and reads a line of text between them: "'Your goal lies beyond either of these two tasks.' Huh, I guess after we pass whatever these do to us, we'll get the scroll." Kat says. "Now, which one to press...
142211222211.title: Inside the Obilisk.

1422112222112.content:
Kat presses the button with the planet next to the marble. The girls blink the floor starts to move down and takes them to the next area.

-----


They end up in a corridor with a door at the end of it. The door itself looks like it could be easily pushed open, and the corridor is around 500 feet long.

Kat grins. "Heh, this doesn't seem to hard."

Ana nods. "Yeah, what a letdown..."

"Mmmhum...well, let's get going, then." Ashley says, and with that, the three girls head down the hallway.

As they walk down the hallway, they start swelling up. At first they think that the test is to keep from getting stuck in the hallway, but then they notice that the hallway seems to be getting longer and wider.

Suddenly, something occurs to Kat. "I...think that button meant that we're going to be inflated while shrinking! We have to hurry before we're too small to open that door!" Kat says. The girls make a break for the door, as quickly as a trio of puffy girls can.
1422112222112.title: Growing and shrinking!

14222.content:
Ana gulps as she puts one puffy foot over the other, as her and Kat's feet are a little wider than the bridge at this point. While their larger feet made it possible for them to cover more ground with each step, Ana's slow, cautious steps have almost negated that advantage.

"It's not much futher, Ana. You've only got like 5 steps to go!" Kat shouts, already on the other side of the bridge.

Ana nervously nods as she takes another step, only to have her other foot miss the bridge. She yelps as she falls onto the bridge, with her left foot dangling below her. "Ana!" Kat shouts, as she manages to rush out onto the bridge. Kat grabs one of Ana's hands and tries to help her up, but as they get her left foot over and onto the bridge, Ana loses balance on her right foot and slips off the bridge. Kat tries to keep Ana from falling any futher, but she gets pulls off the bridge along with Ana.

The girls find themselves falling feet-first into the unknown darkness, but not for too long. Soon after they are surrounded by darkness, they black out.

Kat is the first one to come to. At first, she doesn't find it odd that the first thing she sees are her huge, puffy feet in front of her. She instinctively tries to sit up, only to find that the closest thing she can do is tilt her head upwards. This is when she first notices that her feet are laying on a bed rather than sticking up in the air. She looks around the room to see nothing unusual, until her eyes come across Ana, who's asleep on a bed on the opposite side of the room. Ana basically looks her large feet were attached by the ankles to her head. The only difference was that her head was at least 3 times bigger than what it normally is. It takes Kat a few seconds to realize that she was the same way.

"Oh my god!" Kat shouts, every bit of her usual collectiveness shattered by the sight. "Me and my sister have become giant footgirls!" she continues, with footgirl being the only thing her mind can come up with to describe what they are. This causes a footgirl just like them to run into the room. "It's about time one of you woke up.
14222.title: Footgirls

1422211.content:
Though her hair was managing to cover up her feet, it was easy to see that Ashley was in the same boat that Kat and Ana were.

Though the question was, was she just as much a victim as they were, or is this something Ashley had planned for them?
1422211.title: Ashley...

143.content:
As always, Ashley is trying to make another potion of some sort. She carefully checks a spellbook she has held open as she casually tosses various things into her cauldron. "Just a little more of this...and some of this..." she mumbles, as she tosses a few more things in and slams the book shut. "There! That should do it!" Ashley exclaims, as she dips a flask into her cauldron.

"Mwehehe...this potion should allow me to eat anything..." she says, as she starts to gulp down the contents of the flask. "Erk...tastes kind of unpleasant." she says, as she puts the flask away. For a moment, her stomach, mouth, and jaws start to feel a little tingly, but the feeling soon fades.

"Hrum...I hope that means it worked..." Ashley says, as she looks around the room for something to test her new ability on. "Hrum...let's see...something I wouldn't particularly miss..."
143.title: I guess vore counts as unusual...

1432.content:
"Eh, screw it, I'll just hunt down and eat Red." Ashley says, as she leaves her room in search of him. It doesn't take her long to find him, as he's fallen asleep in the middle of the hallway, with a tray of various ingredients on top of him. "Grr...sleeping on the job again, huh?" she says, as she picks the little imp off the ground. Red groggily opens his eyes, only to see the blurred image of Ashley's wide-open mouth rapidly getting closer.

Wide is an understatement, as Ashley's mouth is stretched out to the size of her head. She almost seems amazed herself as she stuffs Red into her mouth. As she closes her mouth, her cheeks cartoonishly bulge out.

"...mmm...kinda spicy." Ashley says with a muffled voice, as Red struggles to get out of Ashley's mouth. Red's shouts are muffled as Ashley starts to swallow him in one gulp. As she swallows, the bulge in her cheeks moves down to her neck. The bulge stops for a moment, but then continues down her body until it reaches her belly.

Ashley can't help but giggle a little as she feels Red tries his best to escape from her stomach. However, the only thing that Red's struggling does is build up gas within her, which she soon releases in the form of a loud burp. "Mwehehe...my potion works perfectly! But then again..." Ashley begins, as she pats her belly. "...you didn't make much of a meal, Red." she finishes, rubbing her belly to emphasize how little it's bloated up. "But what...er, who should I eat next?" Ashley says, cackling a little as she exits the mansion.
1432.title: Cutting to the non-chase.

choices: she lunges at Ana and tries to swallow her in one gulp.
she gulps down a nearby parking meter.
14321.content:
As Ashley exits her mansion, she notices Kat and Ana walking along the opposite side of the road. "Hum...those two'd probably taste pretty nice, but they're so small..." she says, as she pulls the potion she used on herself. "Hum...with a little modification, I could make those two eat until they're nice and plump, and THEN I'll eat them...yes...that's perfect!" Ashley says, as she grins and runs back into her mansion.

---

After tracking down the girls for an hour or so, Ashley has found a great place to use her potion on the twins. "Mwehehehe...now the potion should work on contact, plus it will make them desire to eat pretty much anything." She says, as she holds a water balloon containing her potion. She looks down from the building she's standing on to see the two girls begin to walk by. She grins and throws her balloon down and watches as they both get splashed by the balloon.

"Eeewww...what is this smelly stuff!?" Ana says as she and Kat try to wipe it off. However, they stop when the potion kicks in.

Kat blinks. "I feel really hungry all of a sudden..." she says, before...
14321.title: Getting them stuffed.

choices: The girls only eat a few buildings before they're satisfied.
The girls end up eating the whole city.
143212.content:
Without thinking, Kat opens her mouth wide and takes a bite out of a nearby parking meter, eating most of it with that one bite.

Ana blinks, with a look of awe on her face. "Wow! How'd you do that, Kat?"

Kat shrugs. "I just did. Huh. I'm still extremely hungry, too!" Kat says, as she pats her meter-filled belly. "Maybe you can do the same?" Kat suggest.

"Well...I am extremely hungry like you are, so maybe..." she says, before eating a parking meter just like Kat did. "I did it!" She says, giggling a bit.

Meanwhile, Ashley watches them from above. "Mwehehe...perfect! They'll keep eating everything until they're gigantic...I can't wait." She says, grinning.

Back on the ground, the girls get an idea. "Hehe, I have an idea...since it seems we can eat anything, why don't we see which one of us can eat more?" Kat suggests.

Ana giggles. "You're on!" Ana says, before taking a huge bite out of the building Ashley is standing on. Ashley cackles to herself again and jumps down from the building just as Kat and Ana begin eating it up.
143212.title: Eating up the town.

choices: Ashley eats her up before she can react.
Ana grabs Ashley before she can do anything.
1432122.content:
Ashley watches on a hill on the outskirts of the city as the girl's competion becomes ravenous, with the pair eating everything they can get their hands up like a pair of giant monsters. She giggles a little as they get wider with each bite, until they are as wide as 1/4 of the city. The mile-wide pair giggles a little as they wiggle their hands, completely immobile except for their arms.

"Draw?" Ana asks with a wide grin on her face.

Kat nods. "Definately." she says as she flaps her arms a little.

As for Ashley, the girls are too large to notice her approach them. They don't know she's around until Ana can feel someone crawling on her back...
1432122.title: A City Devoured

14321222.content:
Ana reaches to her back and manages to grab Ashley before she can start gulping her down. "Ooooh...it looks like we missed a morsel!" Ana says as she licks her lips as Ashley flails her limbs while being held by her dress.

Kat giggles. "I had a feeling she had something to do with this...I'd eat her, but she's so small..." she says as she pokes Ashley with one of her fingers, which prompts Ashley to try and bite her. "Hehe...she's hungry too. Let's feed her, then! That way we'll fill up that stomach of hers and be able to actually make a meal out of her!" Kat suggests.

"Oooh...what are we going to fill her with?" Ana asks.
14321222.title: Meal Reversal

choices: The girls set their sights on the rest of the planet.
143212221.content:
Before Kat can answer, Ana lip-locks Ashley and begins to blow her up like a balloon. The look of anger Ashley had before was not a look of pure shock. Ana giggles and moves her hands outward as she makes Ashley swell up, and stops only when Ashley has been blown up to a little bigger than she is.

"And now, to eat you up!" Ana says, as she quickly wides her mouth to stuff Ashley's head inside of it. Kat watches in amusement as Ashley's large body slowly slides into the body of her sister, which makes her expand even further as more of Ashley is swallow. Ashley tries to flail her limbs again, but all she can manage to do is make her feet wiggle around.

Eventually, Ana manages to gulp down every bit of Ashley's puffed-up body. "Mmmm...she wasn't very filling, but she was pretty tasty...kinda like a big marshmellow!" She says with a giggle. Thanks to Ashley, Ana is now a little under twice the size of Kat. "But...I'm starting to get hungry again..."
143212221.title: Ana Ate Ashley

choices: Try to find a way to eat more stuff.
1432122211.content:
