When the game loads up, Kat and Ana watch as Mona's body is busy trying to grab her eyes, though not having much luck because of the weightlessness of space.

The twins do a double take. "Oh my, is that really Mona, or did she just program her likeness into the game?" Ana asks.

This causes Mona to stop trying to grab her eyes and turn toward the screen. Her eyes do the same thing. "Well, I guess that rules out "just programmed her likeness into the game.". Kat says, as she sits down at the computer. "Don't worry, I'll help you out, Mona, now, let's see..."

Kat opens up the location indicator and sees that Wario Ware Inc. is the only possible selection other than cancel. "Well, I don't want to just continue here, so..." Kat says, as she clicks on the 'Wario Ware Inc.' choice. Soon enough, Mona and her eyes are whisked away to an area that looks just like the main lobby of Wario Ware Inc. Mona manages to pick up her eyes and puts them where her neck would normally be. Surprisingly, they stay in place.

"Well, now that we've reunited Mona with her eyes, why don't we find a way to reunite the rest of her head with her body?" says Ana. Kat nods, and wonders what to do.
1512121211.title: Mona's Virtually Headless

15121212112.content:
"It doesn't look like there's anything to do around here. Let's see where else we can go." Kat says, as she moves the cursor about the screen in order to find some exits. She manages to find two exits. One is labeled 'factory', and the other is labeled 'research and development'.

"Well, where should we head to, then?" asks Ana.
15121212112.title: Now where to?

choices: Mona ends up with her own head.
Mona ends up with something else for a head.
151212121121.content:
Kat decides to click on the door leading to the factory area, which causes Mona to walk over to the door and go in.

Once inside, they see a belt that goes deeper into the factory and a few molds suspended above it. Kat mouses over the molds, but all they say is 'mold' for each of them. "Wah, how do we know which one of these will fix Mona's head!?" asks Ana, as Mona decides to deposit her eyes into a part of the machine that is clearly labeled with 'Eyes go here'.

"Well, I guess we'll just have to chance it..." Kat says, as she clicks on one of the buttons that represents one of the molds."
151212121121.title: Which mold is which?

choices: The head of one of the other girls.
1512121211212.content:
One of the molds drops onto the belt and is carried away as Mona's eyes are inserted into it through a small hole on the top.

Eventually, the mold returns and opens up, revealing...
1512121211212.title: Will it even be a head at all?

15121212112122.content: When the mold opens up, it appears to be some kind of extremity with eyes and a mouth. Mona just shrugs and attaches it where her neck used to be. "Well, it's not a head, but it's something." she says, as she feels her newly attached 'head'.
15121212112122.title: Mona's new 'head'.

151212121121222.content:
Mona giggles a little as she runs her hands across her head, which seems to be in the shape of a foot. "Oh my, my head's shaped like a foot...and it's a pretty ticklish one, too!" she says as she wiggles the toes on it, which are sticking out of her hair and are above her eyes.

Kat blinks. "Uhm, why don't we see if we can fix it, then?" she asks.
151212121121222.title: A foot: a head.

151212122.content:
Ashley forgot that this is a older computer,she thought she turned it off but she just turns off the screen.

The other thing she dident notes is the contenue butten in the corner of the screen before she turned it off.

A few houers later a random office worker bumps into the desk and knockes the mouse on the floor and clicking the respawn button and reseting the game.
The worker gets up and walks away without knowing that he probably just saved Mona's life.

Mona wakes up in the wario ware stage, and wonders why she isent dead "oh thank the lord I thought it was over for me."
"Just one thing how do I get out of here?"
151212122.title: Respawn

choices: She can turn people into sentient food.
She becomes a liquid-girl who can make others into what she's made of.
152.content:
Ashley had been curious about a certain creation she found in an old, worn out spell book. While the name and ingredients needed were as plain as day, the effect was completely rendered unreadable. However, never one to turn down some interesting experimentation, Ashley was more than happy to produce whatever it was she was creating.

The name she had for the potion? Eat-All Potion
152.title: Ashley

choices: She felt wet and sewaty all over(water)
She starts to feel sticky all over(jam/jellow)
Her body starts to streach oddly (putty/gum)
1522.content:
Eat-All Potion
1 cup of Jello
2 eggs of silly putty
1 jar of jam
1 quart of purified water form the Himalayas.
1 mouthful of abc gum
1 witches brew

Mix all of the ingredients together in a big black pot and let it boil while stirring liberally. (chanting/singing/speaking in riddles optional) when it's rea__ the potion w___

The rest is too hard to make out.

Ashly stared at the final few lines which would normally give a description on what the potion does. Sure she had the name, The Eat-All potion, but who's to say how that would be achieved?

"Oh well I guess I have to try it to find out." stated Ashly out loud to herself.

With that she set out to get the ingredients a jello snack cup should be enough, bouncy putty will have to do, and the bottled water at least has a picture of the Himalayas on it. The witches brew is the most impotent part it infuses the magic and is unique to each witch and is closely guarded least someone copies it. Ashly quickly wiped hers up and tossed in the ingredients and started stirring.

" The hard part now is figuring out when it is done" Ashly thought as her pot grew hot over the heat of the flames. Ashly's stool teetered as she stirred, her excitement growing as the pot came to a boil the bubbles growing bigger and bigger until

SPLAT

The bubble popped and sent Ashly flying backwards off her stool and on to her butt covered in gunk.

"Oh no Not again." groaned Ashly wiping the concoction from her eyes only to find something odd.
1522.title: An explosive potion but what is the result?

choices: She jumps into the shower to wash off the goo before it can transform her.
She realizes she has already been transformed.
15222.content:
Sticky, why do all potions have to be sticky. Ashly thought flicking some of the concoction onto the ground. Now I have to take a shower and I had gone so long without too. Ashly frowned as she stood up taking a step forward.

*Splert*

Looking down Ashly saw to her disdain the red goo around her foot. "ugh I need to be more careful." She groaned lifting up her foot to look and sure enough along her sole there was that ruby red sticky jell. she put her foot back down

*Splert*

Ignore it I'll make Red clean it up later it's not worth my time. She thought and started the long trek to the bathroom on the other side of the mansion, each step making a sickly sound and leaving behind a red foot print. Finaly! Perhaps I should move this room closer to the potion room. Ashly thought taking a step inside the porcelain room and flicking the light switch. The lights flickered and swayed creating eerie shadows on every surface Ashly puffed her self up taking pride in the creepy atmosphere she provided and thrived in. she quickly turned the nob to the shower and started to undress.

"Huh?" Rather she attempted to undress for as she pulled up on the hem of her dress it melted through leaving only a pile of goo in her hands. "What the heck! this junk ate through my cloths!" She yelled "But that's not right, there was only a layer on me before from the explosion, this is far too much unless...this goo is my cloths" A look of realization flashed across Ashly's face "This could be bad."
15222.title: She starts to feel sticky all over(jam/jellow)

choices: A plant monster like Audrey 2 from Little Shop of Horrors
A rock monster in the shape of the girl
1523.content:
The Beyond-Potion
1 strand of witches hair
1 witches brew
2 leaves from a Venus fly trap
1 bottle of pure water
3 chewed up chicken flavored gum
1 mL of Newt Slime
2 cups of Morning Dew
3 pints of rocks from the driest desert

Ashley was surprised that all of things worked well with a little magic. She was stirring in her cauldron as the ingredients melted and fizz. Red, her little assistant, looked concerned as the whole room smelt of danger. The potion was bubbling and steaming giving Ashley the signal that its done.

The girl took a spoon and drank the thing herself. Before she can, Red warn her, "Be careful Ashley, you don't know what this drink is capable of."

"And that's why I'm drinking it.", said Ashley.

The girl ignored her assistant and drank it anyways. There was nothing at first as the girl felt disappointed until her stomach ached. She then turns into...
1523.title: She becomes something unearthly

choices: Water me while I try to find a way to turn back
15231.content:
Ashley suddenly turned green and even more leafy. Her assistant Red hid behind a chair. The witch's feet were planted on the ground. Her body got skinnier as her head got more bigger. Her hair turned into a bunch of leaves as well as her head band. She now looks like a Venus fly trap with her normal human head being big and green.

"This is new.", said Ashley.

"Master, are you alright?", said Red as he got out of his hiding place.

"I can't move and feel skinny.", said the girl.

"Is there anything I can do for you?", said the assistant.

"Well...", said Ashley.
15231.title: A plant monster like Audrey 2 from Little Shop ...

choices: Some humans since you gave me the idea
152311.content:
"OH NO! NOT LIKE THAT MOVIE!" cried Red.

"Maybe you can feed me some humans. Just not Wario because he'll probably taste bad." said Ashley.

"You don't want to turn back to normal." asked Red.

"I don't think I can until I get used to my new hands if you call it that." said Ashley as she moved around her vine like arms and hand like leaves.

"So what would you like to eat?" asked Red.

The human headed plant tries to think and requested to eat...
152311.title: Feed me! Anything will do!

choices: Ashley did not finish her dinner
1523112.content:
"Thank god." said Red.

"Hurry up. I'm starving and I can't get food for myself." said Ashley.

Red got on cooking with literally everything in the kitchen ranging from a variety of meat and vegetables. Once he's done, he delivered the mountains of food to his master who was shocked.

"I don't think I can finish." said Ashley.

"Thank god again." said Red as the demon begin feeding his master.

Ashley ate a huge chunk of food as her new state made her eat more than usual. Red was afraid of the possible consequences from this. In the end...
1523112.title: Something in the kitchen

15233.content: How about an animal? That stuff does happen in witch craft and it is a classic trope.
15233.title: Something Else

155.content: Afraid so. If I just added a girl here it would make it hard to insert girls in future additions. And such. Anyway...let's start with Penny...
155.title: Do we have to do it like this?

choices: They both stop growing at the same time: It's a tie.
1551.content:
Meanwhile in the very center of Diamond City

"... And by isolating the gene, I believe I've discovered unlimited growth!" exclaimed Penny in a joyous tone.

"Laughable, highly laughable." the little witch Ashley suddenly interuppted. "Only my witch craft is capable of something like that." she added in a sort of insulting tone.

"Oh, is that so?" Penny responded to Ashley. "Then may I suggest a bit of a contest then? My science against your spells. Biggest girl is the bigger girl." She said looking at Ashley directly in her eyes.

"Very well, I agree. But I want to make it a tad bit more intresting." Ashley stated.

"Hm? How so?" Penny asked.

Ashley looked back at Penny and smiled. "The winner not only gets the satisfaction of victory, but the loser gets eaten by the winner. do you agree?" she finished while licking her lips.

"That does sound intresting, alright, I agree." Penny agreed with a sly smile on her face.

Ashley revealed her wand and began to encircle herself in an enchantment, and at that very moment, Penny revealed a device from seemingly nowhere, pointed it at herself and activated it.

"Game on shorty!" Ashley said mokingly to Penny.

"We'll see who's the shorty, shrimp!" Penny said in response to Ashley.

Both girls began to grow and expand at an increadible rate. At first by mere inches, then by feet. Within no time at all, they were both uprooting trees, tipping over vehicles, and crushing smaller buildings all with sheer growth.

"Feeling a tad small yet?" Penny asked Ashley.

"You wish. I shall be the one who dwarfs you." Ashley replied.

Penny shifted her hip slighlty to the left in an effort for comfort, however in the process, she accidently knocked over one of the larger buildings. "Ooops" Penny said.

"Heh heh. Klutz." laughed Ashley.

Seconds later of steady growth, Diamond City at this point was standing under the massive feet that stood on top of it. Finally...
1551.title: Penny Crygor

choices: Penny increases Ashley's size, while inside her stomach.
15511.content:
Ashley's growth came to a sudden halt, and it seemed as though she were also out of breath. Penny on the other hand was still growing at an accelerating rate.

"Science wins today little witch." Penny said now towering over Ashley.

"I... Suppose now I'm supposed to go through on my end of the wager. Very well, make it quick!" Ashley yelled.

"Well that's no way to talk to the winner." Penny replied as she rubbed her growling belly. She reached all the way down and scooped Ashley up and brought her to mouth level. To Penny, Ashley was no bigger than her index finger.

"Had I really grown so radically?" Penny thought to herself for a second, but then opened her mouth and tossed her in. Penny didn't even bother to chew, but she did toy a little with her meal.

On the inside of Penny's mouth, Ashley was being swished back and forth. She was damp, and covered from head to toe in Penny's warm' sticky spit, until finally in one single gulp, Ashley was swallowed whole.

Ashley spashed down in Penny's stomach, and on the outside, Penny patted her tummy in saticifaction.

"Perhaps I should further test my scientific marvel." Penny said to herself.
15511.title: Ashley's growth stops: Penny wins.

choices: Ashley grows in size to match Penny
155112.content:
"You and you confounded science!" Ashley screamed in discontent, while flailing her rather large arms and legs about. Penny's evergrowing stomach simply jiggled in merryment.

After a while, Ashley settled down.

"Finally out of energy are we?" Penny while laughing silently to herself, and patting her witch filled stomach.

Penny stared at her growth device.

"Even though I won, I believe your full potential has yet to have been gained." Penny said still staring at the device. "I guess for the sake of science, let's see what you can really do!"

"What are you going on about? Hey do you hear me out there?!" Ashley asked.

Penny opened her mouth wide, pointed the barrel of her device down her throat, and hit Ashley square in the head.

"What in the..!?" Ashley muttered as she began a rapid expansion from inside Penny's stomach.
155112.title: Penny increases Ashley's size, while inside...

1551121.content:
As the walls of Penny's stomach seem to shrink around her, Ashley became rather cramped and uncomfortable. However on the outside, Ashley's expansion felt phenomenal to Penny. Needless to say, the feeling only increased the larger Ashley grew.

Penny's belly went from rather large bulge to blimp-like, even for one as already titanic as she was. It grew to about half her size, and began to be supported by the ground. Penny gave a sigh of relief, it was soon becoming too large and heavy for her to carry.

Ashley was still growing larger from inside Penny to match and even suprpass her size. Diamond City became completely covered under Penny's stomach.

"Grandpa would be so proud." Penny giggled to herself, sitting down, almost totally imobile.

Penny's peaceful state was suddenly interupted by a very tiny pair. A duo of kindergarden ninjas named Kat and Ana to be exact. Penny barely noticed them sneaking up on her right side, but unknown to the ninjas, their presence had been detected. Penny lost track of them once they rounded her belly, and stood at her toes.

"Ready Ana? Just like you practiced okay." Kat said to her sister.

"Right! I'm ready!" Ana replied. Without hesitation, Ana opened her mouth wide open and ran directly towards Penny's right big toe. Actually all of Penny's toes are big, so her biggest toe. Ana managed to wrap her entire mouth around Penny's toe, and this caused Penny to burst out in laughter.

"Well someone's ticklish now isn't she?" Kat stated while watching her sister trying to fit a house sized toe into her mouth.
1551121.title: Ashley grows in size to match Penny

15511211.content:
"Hmm, wait are those two trying to swallow me?" Penny asked herself feeling a wet and warm sensation on her toe. "Impossible, even by super natural standards!" Penny announced now laughing at Ana's clearly unrealistic goal.

"You shouldn't underestimate the abilites of shinobi! Ana, go ahead and show her what I mean!" Kat said to Ana, and Ana replying with a thumbs up.

Completly disregarding pretty much every law of physics, Ana managed to swallow down Penny from her toes, to her ankles, to her waist, to her city sized belly, and to her torso.

Penny was absolutly astonished by the blatant defience of logic, and was almost entirly swallowed down herself.

"Unbelievable! Not unbelievable, but rather absolutly impossibe!" Penny shouted in disbeleif as she was completly swallowed.

"Serves you right science geek!" Ashley said mockingly and laughing from inside Penny.

"Oh quiet you...!" Penny replied at a loss for better words.

On the outside, Ana released a loud, planet shaking belch, and a victorious pat on her belly.

"I really did it sis!" Ana said to Kat who pearched herself on the top of her sister's belly.

"You sure did sister." Kat proudly replied.
15511211.title: Ana succeeds.

choices: Make everyone know Ashley is the greatest.
15512.content:
Penny stood back up to regain her composure, but as she stood up, she found herself looking up, and up, and further up still. She stood there staring at an all encompassing red, and a certain shine.

"It's very rude to stare you know." Penny heard from seemingly everywhere. Finally it occured to her, the all encompassing red... Was Ashley's left shoe, and the rest of her acending into the skies.

"Why hello there, tiny!" Ashley said mockingly.

"Gasp... This is an unfavorable outcome." Penny muttered, as she soon found herself feeling completely weightless. Penny was being lifted, and held to eye level by the now titanic sized Ashley.

"May I ask you who's method is inferior now, or do I demonstrate my dominance again?" Ashley said adding with an obvious manical laugh. Penny nervously awaited her next action.
15512.title: Penny's growth stops: Ashley wins.

info.brief_description: An interactive story about Transformation (Mainly Inflation) and Wario Ware
info.description: Wario Ware was always strange and quirky, but in this interactive things will get even weirder for the girls of the series. Starting out as an inflation interactive, there is now more room to do weird things with the girls. Anything is acceptable as long as it is not too graphic, so feel free to add on.
